tactic: induction Buch as [aL | a aP' Q' R' Buch' IH].
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 3 branches.

original: intros aP R Q Buch. induction Buch as [aL | a aP' Q' R' Buch' IH]. - intros a Ha. apply red_cons. + apply zerop_red. + apply In_inv. apply H. - intros a Ha. apply red_cons with (p := nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP'). + apply nf_irreducible. + apply In_addEnd in Ha. destruct Ha as [|Ha]. * subst. apply IH. right. apply Ha. * apply IH. left. apply Ha.
